title: Please help me to identify this font
author: kisaev

comments.content: **[Cabarga (Medium Solid)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133620/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Cabarga%20-%20Medium%20Solid&fid=a26e7e3f354b3c48710eee9071c56500&fsize=60&text=K%26R&wrap=2)** by Leslie Cabarga, Demetrio E. Cabarga [Letraset, 1982] also available from ITC & Linotype
